scripts.build: yarn run build:clean && yarn run build:tailwind && yarn run build:tsx
scripts.build:tailwind: NODE_ENV=production tailwindcss build src/style.css -o dist/style.css -c tailwind.config.js
scripts.build:tsx: NODE_ENV=production microbundle src/*.tsx -f cjs -o dist --no-sourcemap --jsx React.createElement --target node
scripts.dev:tsx: microbundle watch src/*.tsx -f cjs -o dist --no-sourcemap --jsx React.createElement --target node
